title: The People’s Champion
sub_head: Emma Weyant stars at the NCAA swimming championships.
body:
The thunderous applause at the NCAA women’s swimming championships on Thursday in Atlanta was for the University of Virginia’s Emma Weyant, who raced through the 500-yard freestyle in an impressive 4:34.99.
Following Ms. Weyant, Erica Sullivan of Texas touched the wall in 4:35.92 and Stanford’s Brooke Forde was next in 4:36.18.
